user.title: GTFS Performant Setup
user.description: Configure your GTFS transit data sources

data_description.static_url: URL to the static GTFS data ZIP file
data_description.realtime_url: URL to the GTFS realtime protobuf feed
data_description.name: Friendly name for this integration

select_stops.title: Select Stops to Monitor
select_stops.description: Choose which stops you want to monitor for departures. Found {stops_count} stop groups.

data_description.selected_stops: Enter stop IDs separated by commas, or leave empty for all stops

select_routes.title: Select Routes to Monitor
select_routes.description: Optionally filter by specific routes for each stop

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to GTFS data source
error.cannot_load_stops: Failed to load stops from GTFS data

abort.already_configured: This GTFS source is already configured

init.title: GTFS Performant Options
init.description: Configure update intervals and other options

data_description.update_interval: How often to fetch realtime updates (10-300 seconds)
